## onChange() function

Calls `callback` every time the pointed value of `pointer` changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function onChange<P extends PointerType<$IntentionalAny>>(pointer: P, callback: (value: P extends PointerType<infer T> ? T : unknown) => void): VoidFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pointer | P | A pointer (like <code>object.props.x</code>) |
|  callback | (value: P extends [PointerType](./dataverse.pointertype.md)<!-- -->&lt;infer T&gt; ? T : unknown) =&gt; void | The callback is called every time the value of pointerOrDerivation changes |

<b>Returns:</b>

VoidFn

An unsubscribe function
